name: ArtifactoryGenericDownload
description: Download artifacts from Artifactory using FileSpecs, while allowing to collect build-info. The collected build-info can be later published to Artifactory by the "Artifactory Publish Build Info" task.
author: JFrog

inputs.name: artifactoryService
inputs.label: Artifactory service
inputs.helpMarkDown: Artifactory service used for downloading artifacts.

inputs.name: specSource
inputs.label: File spec source
inputs.helpMarkDown: To specify the artifacts you wish to download from Artifactory, please create a File Spec. To read more about the File Spec schema click here.

inputs.name: fileSpec
inputs.label: Spec
inputs.helpMarkDown: Use file spec from task configuration.

inputs.name: file
inputs.label: File path
inputs.helpMarkDown: Use file spec from a local file.

inputs.name: collectBuildInfo
inputs.label: Collect build info
inputs.helpMarkDown:
Select to collect build info and store it locally.
The build info can be later published to Artifactory using the "Artifactory Publish Build Info" task.

inputs.name: includeEnvVars
inputs.label: Include environment variables
inputs.helpMarkDown: Select to include environment variables in the published build info.

inputs.name: failNoOp
inputs.label: Fail task if no dependencies were downloaded
inputs.helpMarkDown: Select if you'd like the task to fail if no dependencies were downloaded.
